title: Two bedroom Price Drop!! Amazing location!! Lease Now!!
posting_body: ['Take a Virtual Tour Today!', '<URL>', 'Terra Vista at the Park', '5425 S. Federal Circle, Littleton, CO, 80123', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Terra Vista at the Park', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 944 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Terra Vista at the Park offers comfortable apartment living brimming with amenities at an unbeatable Littleton location.', 'These Littleton apartments for rent are conveniently located with easy accessibility to downtown Littleton, the Littleton light rail stop, Santa Fe Drive, and an abundance of outdoor activities.', 'Make yourself at home with our outdoor swimming pool, clubhouse with WiFi, and fitness room for your enjoyment.', 'Our apartments in Littleton include washer and dryer in the home, a balcony or patio, a fireplace, and loads of closet space to fit your lifestyle.', 'Call us today to schedule your tour and make Terra Vista at the Park your next home.', 'Features', '- Wood burning fireplaces in all homes', '- Additional storage off of the large patio/balcony', '- Large bedrooms with high speed internet access', '- Renovated interiors including new appliances, counter tops, cabinets, and wood flooring in the kitchen, bathrooms, and entry', '- Washer and dryer included in all floor plans', 'Community Amenities', '- Less than a 5 minute drive to the Downtown Littleton Light Rail Station', '- Swimming Pool', '- Conveniently located near Littleton Golf and Tennis Club, Bowles Grove Park, and Mary Carter Greenway Trail', '- Clubhouse with WiFi', '- Onsite management', '- Minutes from Aspen Grove shopping center', '- Fitness center', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Call for policy.', 'c4W3Yil3D']
